name: anti_microbrick
description: Prevents microbricks from being placed on the server, warning players that place them and eventually clearing them.
author: x

clear-after-minutes.description: How many minutes to wait before clearing someone's bricks if they've placed microbricks.

max-violations.description: The number of violations a user can make before being temporarily banned for `ban-time`.

ban-time.description: The length of the temporary ban, in minutes.

max-bans.description: How many temporary bans before permanently banning a user.
